message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by many satisfied customers. Given its quality and features, it's worth more than $100 to us. Considering its value, we're offering it to you for $120. This is a special offer considering the high demand and limited stock.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value you're placing on the product, I'm only willing to pay $90 at this time.  Let's see if we can reach a mutually agreeable price.

Thank you for your response, Bob. After careful consideration, we're willing to meet you halfway. We propose an offer of $105 for our product. We hope this aligns better with both our expectations and allows you to enjoy the value this product offers.

Alice, I appreciate you coming down on the price.  I'm still only comfortable offering $95.  This is my final offer, as I can get the same product from another seller for $100. Let me know if you're willing to accept.
